DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the efficacy of early intervention (dosing within 2 hours of onset of the migraine attack) with eletriptan 40mg on mild versus moderate to severe pain intensity of migraine.
DOC.brief_title: A Trial to Study of the Effects of Eletriptan 40mg on Mild vs Moderate to Severe Pain Intensity of Migraine
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of migraine with or without aura according to the recent IHS criteria. Migraine headaches must have been present for more than one year. History in the last 3 months of 1 to 4 acute attacks of migraine headache per month. Subjects with current or past history of coronary artery disease. Pregnant or breastfeeding women. Subjects who have chronic daily headaches.
